name: My Happy Place
description: 4 days. The jam lasted a month, but I forgot it existed so I was only able to throw a small experience together, this is especially clear with the level of polish seen... it's not incredible but it's playable. The player watches old recordings from their (strangely familiar?) dreams, starting from what seems to be a normal day in the streets of your home town... Controls: (Very Complicated) WASD - Movement Mouse Movement - Look Credits: Curtains: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/hospital-curtain-c676d68a59dd4cabb5ea20603789e04... Chair: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/hospital-chair-6c29e45873c14f7fa9affccd6446db70 Bed: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/hospital-bed-38d1958302fd41e08bbae647d1e3e99e Trolley: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/laboratory-hospital-troly-7a520914b8cd429fb5972b... Fence: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/wood-fence-low-poly-8adfbcb77b734574ba99fde5bd0d... PlayGround: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/playground-a09cddb58b3342b18c51ab572481d2d7 Post-Release Notes: .I just realised the "Exit" button doesn't event work (I can't update and change it, as this is for a game jam). .After watching hydraxsx on YouTube play this, the UI seems to be zoomed in/cut off so they weren't able to see some of the text..This game sucks, enjoy :)
